question_stem: Variable "smoking level" has 3 levels that has values recorded in numbers (0, 1 and 3), where 0 = “no smoking”, 1 = “
question_stem_html: Variable "smoking level" has 3 levels that has values recorded in numbers (0, 1 and 3), where 0 = “no smoking”, 1 = “<= 5 cigarettes a day” and 3 = “more than 5 cigarettes a day”. It is a categorical variable.
